name: Amazon - Minimal Dark
description: A dark, minimalist take on Amazon.com. Created primarily for my own use, however if someone makes a recommendation or suggestion that I like, I may implement it.
additional_info:
12/12/18 - Inital Release - Works on amazon.com, amazon.co.uk, amazon.co.jp, amazon.fr, amazon.de, and amazon.in.

01/28/19 - Minor tweaks for readability and to make certain things easier on the eyes.

02/21/19 - More tweaks and basic support for AmazonPayments.

03/02/19 - Shopping cart and Automotive tweaks.

03/16/19 - Updates to match "card" changes

12/23/19 - Updated code to reflect changes on the site as well as support for the digital items section.

05/18/20 - Updated to make the white in the product view match the background.

09/29/20 - Minor tweaks and changes. Also added option to change Image Opacity per requests.

discussions.name: Make the image opacity an option
changing picture opacity possible at the end of line 104. change "opacity: 0.5" to 1
